title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Launcher’s Destruction in Lebanon After Kiryat Shmona Attack”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Shortly after the launches towards Kiryat Shmona: the IDF destroyed the launcher in Lebanon from which the fire was directed; two Hezbollah operatives identified in the Majdel Salim area were attacked.

During the morning, IDF forces identified two Hezbollah operatives operating in the Majdel Salim area, and shortly thereafter, an aircraft attacked the operatives.

Earlier today, two launches were identified crossing from Lebanese territory towards the Kiryat Shmona area, with no casualties reported. Shortly thereafter, an aircraft of the Air Force attacked and destroyed the launcher from which the fire originated.

Attached is documentation of the elimination: https://bit.ly/4e5CpZ6
